title: GLOBO's Magic Salsa Dancing Refrigerator
spanish: ¡La nevera baila salsa! Los alimentos bailan también.
english: The fridge dances salsa! The food dances too.
description: GLOBO opens fridge for midnight snack - refrigerator shelves start salsa dancing with food items twirling - milk carton leads salsa while cheese does the cha-cha-cha
surprise_ending: Fridge reveals it's been taking dance classes with the microwave at night!
image_prompt: Cartoon refrigerator doing salsa dance, food items with faces dancing inside, colorful animated style

title: GLOBO's Invisible Spanish Teacher Chaos
spanish: ¡El profesor es invisible! ¿Dónde está el profesor?
english: The teacher is invisible! Where is the teacher?
description: GLOBO sits down for Spanish lesson - invisible teacher throws books and chalk everywhere - books fly open to random pages, chalk writes Spanish words on walls
surprise_ending: Teacher becomes visible - it's a tiny hamster wearing GLOBO's globe sunglasses!
image_prompt: Floating books and chalk writing on walls, tiny hamster with globe-shaped sunglasses, magical classroom scene

title: GLOBO's Flying Taco Food Truck
spanish: ¡El camión de tacos vuela! ¡Los tacos caen del cielo!
english: The taco truck flies! The tacos fall from the sky!
description: Marco orders from normal taco truck - truck sprouts wings and starts flying - tacos rain from the sky while GLOBO tries to catch them
surprise_ending: Truck lands on cloud made of tortillas - it's the taco afterlife!
image_prompt: Flying food truck with wings, tacos raining down, cloud made of tortillas, vibrant Mexican colors

title: GLOBO's Sentient Spanish Dictionary Revolt
english: The words are arguing! Who is right?
description: Dictionary pages come alive, Spanish words floating and arguing about pronunciation - word bubbles flying around, pages flipping frantically
surprise_ending: Words form a union and demand better pronunciation from learners
image_prompt: Animated dictionary with floating word bubbles arguing, letters rearranging themselves, magical learning vibes

title: Self-Stirring Coffee Catastrophe
spanish: ¡La taza tiene brazos! ¡Mezcla todo en la cocina!
english: The cup has arms! It mixes everything in the kitchen!
description: Coffee mug grows tiny arms and starts stirring everything - stirring soup, salad, GLOBO's hair, everything spinning and splashing
surprise_ending: Mug realizes it's been stirring the wrong coffee - GLOBO's been drinking hot chocolate!
image_prompt: Coffee mug with cute little arms stirring everything, kitchen chaos, animated breakfast scene

title: Upside-Down City Car Drive
spanish: ¡El mundo está al revés! ¡Los carros vuelan en el cielo!
english: The world is upside down! The cars fly in the sky!
description: Normal car drive suddenly the city flips upside down - cars driving on clouds, buildings hanging from sky, GLOBO hanging onto steering wheel
surprise_ending: GLOBO realizes he's been holding the map upside down the whole time!
image_prompt: Upside-down city with cars on clouds, buildings hanging down, surreal gravity-defying scene
